name: Naked Nightmare (Connor Blankenship, aquafroq, jaspercmurphy, ashleypoprik, PogEmblem, masonator555, jehorak)
name_original: Naked Nightmare (Connor Blankenship, aquafroq, jaspercmurphy, ashleypoprik, PogEmblem, masonator555, jehorak)
description:
WHAT THE HECK IS GOING ON???

In the middle of class you look down and see that you have no pants! How did you get in class? Where were you last? Did you really not notice that you had no pants on this entire day??? Avoid teachers and explore the school, retracing your steps in order to find your long lost trousers and let this nightmare end.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mason Eastman: Programming

Connor Blankenship: Design, Sprites, and Animation

Kelly Shen: Sprites & Art

Alyssa Diaz: Level Design

Jasper Murphy: Music and Sound Effects

Joseph Horak: Programming, Design, and Sprites

Ashley Poprik: Writing

Special thanks to our mentor Taylor Yust!

Made as a part of UT Game Jam 2020
